changeSet.author: I.Neshin
changeSet.sql: create table Equipment ( Name national varchar(200), SerialNumber int , Equipment_ID int not null, primary key (Equipment_ID) )

changeSet.author: I.Neshin
changeSet.sql: create table EquipmentToSwitch ( Rec_ID int int not null, Equipment_ID int not null )

changeSet.author: I.Neshin
changeSet.sql: create table Persona ( FIO national varchar(200), Number varchar(10) UNIQUE not null, primary key (Number) )

changeSet.author: I.Neshin
changeSet.sql: create table RequestCall ( Number varchar(10), Ð¡alledNumber varchar(10), CallingNumber varchar(10), Request_ID int not null, primary key (Request_ID) )

changeSet.author: I.Neshin
changeSet.sql: create table Switch ( Durations time , Request_ID int , Equipment_ID int, DT datetime, Rec_ID int not null, primary key (Rec_ID) )
